title: philipma1957
author: philipma1957
created_time: November 14, 2022, 02:53:28 AMLast edit: November 14, 2022, 03:12:14 AM by philipma1957
content: I purchased gear on Sept 22. It was supposed to be shipped in Oct and a coupon was supposed to be issued for 30% off my next purchase.Dealing with Lisa from bitmain and she simply refuses to acknowledge that I am due the promised 30% coupon.email chain is leading to nowhere.   philipma1957Nov 14, 2022, 10:43 GMT+8Maybe I am not clear enough. The 30% coupon is to be used on a future order. Not the order I paid for but for one in the future. Why would your company say you are giving a 30% off coupon for a future order and then not give it. It makes you lose the next sale. I have been buying from you since 2013. You never failed to issue a promised coupon for a future order. So now you are going to fail to send me a simple 30% off coupon for my future purchase? Seems to be a really poor way to get me to ever buy from you any more.   philipma1957Nov 14, 2022, 10:38 GMT+8Listen to me very carefully you advertised the s19j in September that you would ship it in 1 month and that 30 days after you shipped it you would issue a 30% coupon. this was on your website.I did this purchase. Because your website said you would send a 30% coupon. 30 days after the shipping date.  And now you are denying me the coupon. I have purchased from you many many times. I really do not understand why you are saying you did not have this offer. On your website.I placed the order on sept 21. I attached a screen shot of the order. In every order I ever made that offered a coupon I was always give my coupon. So what is the issue.Attachment(s)Screen Shot 2022-09-21 at 2.44.43 PM.png   Lisa (BITMAIN)Nov 14, 2022, 10:13 GMT+8Dear philipma1957I couldn't open below link https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5417006.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5414433.0 That's not our website. You said,we will give you a coupon, that's from which BITMAIN link?I will check. Best regards,LisaBITMAINTo buy ANTMINERs, please log in to the website: https://www.bitmain.com/ Kindly be ware of phishing scams and always verify the domain name."Solved" means we replied - we may still be working on your issue.   philipma1957Nov 14, 2022, 07:32 GMT+8when you sold the gear in september you promised that buys would get a coupon. I placed the order so you owe me 30% coupon .you advertised that we would get coupons for 30% if we purchased the goods.please read my threadshttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5417006.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5414433.0you screwed up twice here. when I paid and now you act like i don’t get a coupon.Sad are you part. You owe me the coupon 30% off stop playing games that you are confused.   Lisa (BITMAIN)Nov 14, 2022, 07:19 GMT+8Dear philipma1957 Thanks for your consultation!What's the reason for a coupon?Your query is unclear to our support team, please provide more information regarding your request.Any screenshots or copied error messages are very helpful. Please let us know if you have additional questions or concerns.  Best regards,LisaBITMAINTo buy ANTMINERs, please log in to the website: https://www.bitmain.com/ Kindly be ware of phishing scams and always verify the domain name."Solved" means we replied - we may still be working on your issue.   philipma1957Nov 13, 2022, 05:04 GMT+8I placed an Order in September.Order ID: 00xxxxxxxx201012Date: 2022-09-22 02:32:48Total: 0.10932625 BTCPayment Method: BTCIt shipped Oct 13. I am due 30% coupons where are my coupons ?Please let me know when you give me my coupons for 30% off. thank you.The problem is they want a screen shot of the webpage that shows they were offering this 30% off coupon.I never have had issues on coupons they gave me every coupon I ever was entitled to getSo I did not take a  screen shot that shows they were getting a coupon if you got the gear.So I am out a 30% coupon unless some one has a copy of that page around sept 21 2022 that reads it.see below it is about when I got it but it is after they stopped the coupon offer.Quote from: philipma1957 on September 23, 2022, 02:42:06 PMQuote from: stompix on September 23, 2022, 10:58:59 AMGoing down again, not much and can I can see it changing any time but still not the same build-up as last time.QuoteLatest Block:   755338  (8 minutes ago)Current Pace:   97.6626%  (1355 / 1387.43 expected, 32.43 behind)Next Difficulty Change:   between -2.3358% and -2.0899%Pice down, the difficulty might be down, but god!, what new offers for new clients on electricity have been circulating around here..Get this, one of the "top" offers is at 110 Euros for 150kwh a month without subsidies, of course, the prices are subsidized till 200k kwh at ~25cents but if you go over it, it's 80 eurocents per kwh. Happy mining, everyone!!!Bitmain has dumped the price to 1900 for the 19Pro and I have some real problems understanding this:What am I missing here?instant ship on the one for edit 3230 3900 but uses 3250 watts and 95ththe one for 1900 is a 30 day wait.but the 1900 one also gives you 30% coupon.I order 1 of them the other day.100th and 2950 watts looks good enough for me.Waiting 30 days gives us time to clean the mine and redesign the cooling.I would love to get all 100th units at 2950 watts. lots of over head the psu should last longer.I would love to get s19xp doing 128th and 2700 watts 21 watts a thMy s17's held up running low and normal not turbo.Hoping the same for my s19's or s19 xp'sI found the link for the item I purchased but the coupon offer is not attached to it.https://shop.bitmain.com/en/product/detail?pid=00020220919144041252Ua2SetxW06D3I know there was a coupon offer with that unit.I will look more.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: After spending a long time trying to find some info I managed to get a dead link.bing it and show enough info that the offer did exist.here is the link on a bing searchthe link does not openStill hoping to get this coupon.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: I think that this is the "proof" you need:https://web.archive.org/web/20221004170338/https://support.bitmain.com/hc/en-us/articles/10687719622681-ANTMINER-S19-Pro-Discount-CouponIt's that page you've found, as archived in 4 October.Best of luck!

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.created_time: November 14, 2022, 11:00:39 PMLast edit: November 15, 2022, 10:22:37 AM by BitMaxz
comments.body: I could also see the promotion on Google but after clicking it it seems they remove it. It looks like a falls promotion or maybe they have limited coupons available.Quote from: philipma1957 on November 14, 2022, 07:28:52 PMWell sent it out and hope to get a positive result from them.Thank you.They thought they could get a way. Let's see if they still giving out the coupon.

comments.author: mikeywith
comments.body: Looking at the archived link the Nfish posted above, they mention thisQuoteCoupon Issuance: The following three requirements must be metPreviously purchased ANTMINER S19 Pro,S19 Pro Hyd. or S19 Pro+ Hyd.Delivery time of Q3/Q4 2022So it seems like they only give coupons to those who have already bought any of the Pro versions at a higher price before the drop to 19$/th, are you eligible?The next point is thisQuoteQ4 coupon issuance: Coupons shall be issued once the order is fully delivered. An unsigned delivery confirmation letter shall forfeit the coupons if not signed before the end of the delivery month.Did you sign the delivery confirmation? These rules are new, they used to give out coupons without all these conditions, it's terrible of them to hide all these terms under a bold statement that saysQuoteGood News: BITMAIN will issue coupons for ANTMINER S19 Pro, S19 Pro Hyd. or S19 Pro+ Hyd. orders that are within the delivery time of 2022 Q3/Q4!Bitmain folks are doing what Bitmain folks do.

comments.body: Quote from: mikeywith on November 14, 2022, 11:16:06 PMLooking at the archived link the Nfish posted above, they mention thisQuoteCoupon Issuance: The following three requirements must be metPreviously purchased ANTMINER S19 Pro,S19 Pro Hyd. or S19 Pro+ Hyd.Delivery time of Q3/Q4 2022So it seems like they only give coupons to those who have already bought any of the Pro versions at a higher price before the drop to 19$/th, are you eligible?The next point is thisQuoteQ4 coupon issuance: Coupons shall be issued once the order is fully delivered. An unsigned delivery confirmation letter shall forfeit the coupons if not signed before the end of the delivery month.Did you sign the delivery confirmation? These rules are new, they used to give out coupons without all these conditions, it's terrible of them to hide all these terms under a bold statement that saysQuoteGood News: BITMAIN will issue coupons for ANTMINER S19 Pro, S19 Pro Hyd. or S19 Pro+ Hyd. orders that are within the delivery time of 2022 Q3/Q4!Bitmain folks are doing what Bitmain folks do.I read it multiple times and I think they are not going to honor me with my coupon.So If so I won't be buying any gear for a while.

comments.author: mikeywith
comments.created_time: November 15, 2022, 12:44:45 AMLast edit: November 15, 2022, 08:56:03 AM by mikeywith
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on November 15, 2022, 12:31:22 AMSo If so I won't be buying any gear for a while.I saw someone sell the same model (S19 pro 100th) in the U.S for $1900, isn't that nearly the same as buying it directly from Bitmain even with the coupon discount you may get? I think these guys were given coupons so they managed to grab the gears for cheap, and the possibility they did the tax trick by declaring low amount, I don't know about you but if I had gears that sell locally at $1900 or even $2000 I would rather buy it than going through Bitmain.
